sense.name: institution or enterprise
sense.examples: These companies are all startups. He worked for that company for twenty years.

sense.name: group of people defined by a specific profession
sense.examples: Mary just joined a new dance company. His company was ambushed in the jungle. They encountered a company of bandits in the mountains. This company of firefighters serves the east side of town. The ship's entire company was lost at sea.

sense.name: friendship or fellowship
sense.commentary: COMPANY[+social] (+POSS/+DEF ARTICLE) COMPANY implies either an individual or a group of people.
sense.examples: She misses her brother's company. He found solace in the company of strangers. Company is coming for dinner. We are allowed to have company until ten PM.
